Class GameRunner

java.lang.Object
GameRunner
public class GameRunner extends Object
A class that runs the game of hearts.

    • GameRunner

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerName, PrintWriter clientWriter)
      It adds a player to the game
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player that is joining the lobby.
      clientWriter - The PrintWriter that is used to send messages to the client.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String playerName)
      It removes a player from the game, called when a player leaves the lobby. If the player exists, set the player to null and decrement the number of players in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player to be removed.

    • startGame

      public Player startGame()
      The game starts, the dealer deals cards every cycle, the players play cards, the pile taker is determined, the pile taker gets points based on rules of the current turn, the pile taker starts the next round, and the game ends
      Returns:
      The winner of the game.

    • playCard

      public Boolean playCard(String playerName, Card card)
      "Play a card for the current player." The function is called by the client when the player wants to play a card. The function checks to see if the player is the current player, and if so, it plays the card using Player class's playCard function.
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player who is playing the card.
      card - The card that the player wants to play.
      Returns:
      A boolean value.
